t: If you 'Flip' the door overlay, it will open/close. That is because it has multiple sides.
If you delete a piece don't worry. Press [Alt]+[4] or [Ctrl]+[4] to continue to tutorial #4 which covers that.
Right-click -> Edit will show you an Edit window. So will selecting a piece an pressing [e].
Most things can also be changed quickly by using hot-keys. Press [h] to open the help window - they are listed there.
Now let's manipulate those pieces! Not all pieces support all features, so try and see which do and which don't!
